title: Spiced pumpkin and kumara soup
ingredients: ['3/4 small pumpkin', '2 large onions', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 teaspoon minced root ginger', '3 large orange or golden kumara (sweet potatoes), peeled and cubed', '2 litres veg stock', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons cracked black pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon (15ml) Worcestershire sauce']
